hopobject.body:
The Beagle Pups

Alternatives to the Digi-Key OMAP3 Beagle Board

Because the Beagle Board is an open hardware project, it is only natural that derivative works that address various additional market needs would be born. This page attempts to summarize some of those alternatives.

The first place to look for alternatives is the list of OMAP3 boards on the TI OMAP wiki site.
